text: Hi everyone, i want to add a pop up (contact info) on read more button of the blog listing page, once the user filled the details on pop up he/she only get access to read the particular post. Anyone ever had performed this functionality?  Need urgently help here

Hi there, I looking for a way to change the default checkboxes in a form to iOS like toggle switches. My CSS/HTML knowledge is bit limited but I'm trying my best to get this to work. The issue that I'm facing with most tutorials I find on CSS Tricks and Stackoverflow is that they are using the <label> to style. But since I'm trying to use this for GDPR consent on a form, the text is within a span in that label. Any thoughts?
<@U0170TSLF5L> - you want that form open in some kind of lightbox?
There's no native way to do that, but you can follow those steps from community or do it via API
Hi, has anyone used the <https://www.addthis.com/> social share module on HS? Do you recommend it?
